record.dc:title: 152MM32, 15MM32, Montgomery County, Kentucky. Camargo Mounds Site. Profile 60 & Central Pit.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Kentucky Adena and Woodland Mound Sites
record.wpa:narrative: The central pit has been partially worked out. There were soft spots in this pit which at first were thought to be postmolds. Some such intrusions show in this picture. The level is on stake 65. The very small stakes in the floor are in refilled pits.
